nodeList.altText: The {Bone Prison} is considered a minion and is made up of several small sections, each with a base 500 health. The {Bone Prison} will end after 10 seconds or the curse duration, whichever is shorter.
nodeList.nodeDescription: Bone Prison has +[100] armor and elemental protection per point.

node.altText: The {Bone Prison} is considered a minion and is made up of several small sections, each with a base 500 health. The {Bone Prison} will end after 10 seconds or the curse duration, whichever is shorter.
node.description:
A {Bone Prison} is created around the affected area of your curse, which blocks enemies. Bone Prison lasts for a fixed duration or until broken by enemy damage.

Adds a 20 second cooldown.
node.nodeDescription: A Bone Prison is created around the affected area of your curse. \n\n Adds a 20 second cooldown.
